Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01

Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.network.message.s2c

package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.network.message.s2c
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.am01.network.message
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.am01.network.message.c2s
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.am01.network.message.json
     
  • Class
    Description
    BroadcastMessageSentS2C
    This message is used to inform the player that the BroadcastMessage has been sent.
    DirectMessageSentS2C
    This message is used to inform the player that the DirectMessage has been sent.
    DoubleChoiceS2C
    This message is sent to the player when he tries to choose the secret objective more than once.
    DoubleSideChoiceS2C
    This message is sent to the player when he tries to choose the starting card side more than once.
    EmptySourceS2C
    This message is sent to the player when he tries to draw a card from an empty DrawSource.
    GameAlreadyStartedS2C
    This message is used to inform the player that the specified Game has already started.
    GameFinishedS2C
    This message allows players to receive the final scores of the game, once it has ended.
    GameJoinedS2C
    This message tells player that he has joined a game.
    GameNotFoundS2C
    This message tells the player that the specified game id is incorrect (there are no games with that id).
    GameResumedS2C
    This message notifies players that the game has been resumed.
    InvalidCardS2C
    This message notifies the player that the id of the specified card is incorrect.
    InvalidMaxPlayersS2C
    This message tells the player that the specified maximum threshold (maxPlayers) is not valid.
    InvalidObjectiveSelectionS2C
    This message tells the player that the chosen secret Objective is not valid.
    InvalidPlacementS2C
    This message tells the player that the card placement is not valid.
    InvalidRecipientS2C
    This message tells the player that the recipient he specified is invalid (recipient is not in the same game as the sender).
    KickedFromGameS2C
    This message tells the player that the game has ended prematurely due to an insufficient number of connected players.
    NameAlreadyTakenS2C
    This message tells the player that the specified nickname is invalid because it is already used.
    NewMessageS2C
    This message tells the player that he have received a new Message.
    NotEnoughPlayersS2C
    This message tells the player that the game cannot resume/start since there are not enough players connected.
    PingS2C
    This message is used to detect player disconnections during games.
    PlayerDisconnectedS2C
    This message tells all players in game that a user has logged out.
    PlayerNotInGameS2C
    This message tells the player that he cannot perform the desired action as it is not in game.
    PlayerReconnectedS2C
    This message tells players that a user has just reconnected.
    SetBoardAndHandS2C
    This message gives players all the information they need to start playing.
    SetGamePauseS2C
    This message tells players that the game is paused (SUSPENDED).
    SetPlayablePositionsS2C
    This message tells to the current player his playable positions in the play area.
    SetPlayablePositionsS2C.PlayablePosition
    This record represents a playable position
    SetPlayerNameS2C
    This message tells the user that the chosen name has been accepted.
    SetStartingCardS2C
    This message tells user the id of the starting card assigned to him.
    SetupAfterReconnectionS2C
    This message informs the reconnected player of all necessary game data (the current game's status).
    SetupAfterReconnectionS2C.CardPlacement
    This record represents a card's placement.
    SetupAfterReconnectionS2C.Message
    This record represents a chat message.
    UpdateDeckStatusS2C
    This message tells players the new visible colors of the two decks.
    UpdateFaceUpCardsS2C
    This message tells players about new faceup cards list.
    UpdateGameListS2C
    This message tells players the new list of available games.
    UpdateGameListS2C.GameStat
    This record represents game's data.
    UpdateGameStatusAndSetupObjectiveS2C
    This message tells the player the two secret Objectives assigned to him.
    UpdateGameStatusAndTurnS2C
    This message tells players the new status of the game: GameStatus, TurnPhase and current player.
    UpdateGameStatusS2C
    This message tells the players the new status of the game: SETUP_COLOR.
    UpdateObjectiveSelectedS2C
    This message tells players the list of users who have chosen their secret Objective (SETUP_OBJECTIVE status).
    UpdatePlayAreaAfterUndoS2C
    This message tells players that has been made an undo of the last placement of a player.
    UpdatePlayAreaS2C
    This message tells players the new PlayArea's status of a player who has just placed a card.
    UpdatePlayerColorS2C
    This message tells the player the color choice made by a user (SETUP_COLOR status).
    UpdatePlayerHandS2C
    This message tells the player his new hand.
    UpdatePlayerListS2C
    This message tells players the new list of users connected to the game.
